listicle_headline.notes: Headline for the full listicle (Header section)

listicle_subheadline.notes: Subheadline for the main listicle headline

imageURL.notes: use this field when pulling in an image based on an external storage point using a URL

videoSrc.notes: this field is specific for referencing an external video image when the video image file is too large to upload into the image field

author_name.notes: Field tied to Listicle's Author name

author_image.notes: image src tied to Listicle's author image

groupOffer.notes: Assign Creatives to Group Offer. Example, "high" denotes Top Offer
